definition[0]: giving equal attention to all sides or opinions
example[0]: balanced reporting of the election campaign
example[1]: a balanced account of what happened
definition[1]: arranged to include things or people of different kinds in the right amounts
example[3]: the importance of a balanced diet  (=one that is healthy because it contains the right foods in the right amounts)
example[5]: soup with a delicately balanced flavor
definition[2]: someone who is balanced is calm and sensible, and has good mental health
